titles.title: Condemning the horrific gun violence in Fort Worth, Texas, and acknowledging the human toll of gun violence in this country.
Condemning the horrific gun violence in Fort Worth, Texas, and acknowledging the human toll of gun violence in this country.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the mass shootings in the Como and Polytechnic Heights neighborhoods in Fort Worth, Texas, on July 3, 2023. The resolution also honors the memory of the victims that were lost.
